data.name: Description
data.value: Sprites is a free tool for creating beautiful animated infographics for the Web.

data.name: Feedback_Body
data.value: You can send us your comments, feature requests or bug reports (check out our support page and blog as well). We appreciate all the feedback and will gladly answer every email. Thank you!

data.name: Headline
data.value: Beautiful animated infographics and online presentations. Quick and easy.

data.name: Pitch_1_Description
data.value: With a good set of visual elements and built-in themes composing your infographic becomes super-easy.

data.name: Pitch_2_Description
data.value: The basic version of Sprites is absolutely free for everybody and all infographics are released under Creative Commons license.

data.name: Pitch_3_Description
data.value: Everything in Sprites is 100% HTML5-based and plugin-free. There's no Flash or any other proprietary technology used.

data.name: Pitch_4_Description
data.value: Sprites infographics utilize the newest responsive design techniques and should look good on pretty much any device.

data.name: Pitch_5_Description
data.value: We try to make Sprites infographics shine on as many platforms as possible. You can already try it on your iPhone and iPad.

data.name: Pitch_6_Description
data.value: The JavaScript SDK plus the guidelines on making your own themes are available at github.com/spritesapp.

data.name: YourMessage
data.value: What would you like to tell us?

data.name: Team_SayHello
data.value: Although we're not currently hiring, you're always welcome to drop us an email and say Hello!

data.name: Account_YourName_Description
data.value: How would you like us to call you?

data.name: ProBeta
data.value: While we're not ready yet to accept payments, the Pro subscription is free of charge!

data.name: DemoSignInNote
data.value: Note: You won't be able to save your changes or publish your infographic in this mode.

data.name: Examples_Dxb_Description
data.value: This infographic focuses on the size and capacity of one of the largest airport in the World - Dubai International (DXB).

data.name: Examples_Sleep_Description
data.value: Find out how much sleep is enough (and how much is not), which country gets most sleep and other interesting facts.

data.name: LearnHowTo
data.value: Learn how to create infographics here: Creating your first infographic

data.name: Examples_Internet_Description
data.value: Let's see how much time people spend on Internet and how quickly this medium has grown over the recent years.

data.name: Examples_Widgets_Description
data.value: This quick example demonstrates some of the cool things you can do by using widgets in your infographics.

data.name: WeUseCookies
data.value: Hi there! Just so you know, we use cookies. Learn more

data.name: Title
data.value: Create infographics and online presentations | Sprites

data.name: Email_PasswordReset_Body
data.value:
Hello there!

Somebody (maybe you) has requested a password reset for your Sprites account. If this was you, click "Reset password" below to reset your password:

Reset password

All the best,
Pavel Volgarev (Sprites).

data.name: Account_YourEmail_Exists
data.value: This email is already in use.

data.name: Email_ValidateEmail_Body
data.value:
Welcome!

Hello and welcome to Sprites! To complete the sign-up, we just need to verify your email. Click "Verify email" below to do so:

Verify email

All the best,
Pavel Volgarev (Sprites).

Hello there!

Just so you know, your Sprites subscription for {0} is about to expire soon. If you wish to continue using all the features, click "Go to my account" below and submit a new payment.

Go to my account

All the best,
Pavel Volgarev (Sprites).

data.name: Examples_Coffee_Description
data.value: Learn how much the average American spends on (and consumes) coffee and who are the big players on the market.

data.name: Testimonial_1
data.value: This is FANTASTIC! And very easy to use. I cannot wait to plug in all my data to tell stories.

data.name: Testimonial_2
data.value: Hi Guys - LOVE LOVE LOVE this app.

data.name: Testimonial_3
data.value: Awesome product, I'm going to start playing with it asap.

data.name: AgencyBeta
data.value: Join our private beta program and test the new features for free!

data.name: AlreadyHaveAccount
data.value: Already have an account? Sign in

data.name: AgencyBetaVideo
data.value: Join our private beta program and test video infographics for free!

data.name: VideoPitch_1
data.value: Convert your entire infographic into a video in just a couple of clicks.

data.name: VideoPitch_2
data.value: Optionally specify an audio file - great for adding music or narration.

data.name: VideoPitch_3
data.value: Download your video and share it with your audience the way you want.

data.name: Info_ResetTokenExpired
data.value: Your session has expired. Please re-submit your password reset request.

data.name: Features_Blocks_Description
data.value: Sprites offers rich selection of building blocks for you to choose from. Text, charts, maps, tables, images, progress bars and more - all of this will make your presentations speak for themselves like never before.

data.name: Features_EaseOfUse_Description
data.value: Sprites editor is very intuitive and easy to use. We are handling all the complexity so you can focus on what is truly important - your visual story.

data.name: Features_HTML5_Description
data.value: Sprites is built on top of latest and greatest from HTML5 technology stack which includes great typography, slick animations, smooth shadows and gradients and many more.

data.name: Features_MultiSlide_Description
data.value: Sprites combines best practices of creating infographics with the flexibility of a normal multi-slide presentation. This unique approach makes it possible to compose exceptional visual stories.

data.name: Features_Password_Description
data.value: Every Sprites presentation can be additionally secured with the password so that you can safely share sensitive information with your peers. And in case you have changed your mind, you can always make the presentation public again.

data.name: Features_Responsive_Description
data.value: All Sprites presentations (with no exception) are fully responsive meaning that they look great on pretty much any resolution, from mobile phone to projector. Same applies when you are inserting presentations on your website or blog: they will automagically scale to match the width of your content.

data.name: Features_Themes_Description
data.value: We have a great selection of colorful, unique built-in themes for every mood, and every occasion. And in case you need a custom (branded) theme, it is super-easy to create your own from scratch or extend existing one.

data.name: Features_Developer_Description
data.value: Sprites is also very developer-friendly: there's a number of ways you can extend the platfom if you know how to write code. For example, you can create your own elements (widgets) or make your own themes. Documentation as well as code examples are available on GitHub.

data.name: Features_DownloadImage_Description
data.value: Individual slides can be exported as JPG images which is great for making previews, thumbnails or even displaying a complete presentation as an image gallery. You can also download your entire presentation as a single PDF document.

data.name: Features_Import_Description
data.value: Sprites can take your data residing in Excel file, Google Spreadsheet or under the custom URL and import it into your presentation. This is especially useful when showing charts from calculations that you made previously and that you would like to now publish.

data.name: Features_LiveData_Description
data.value: Sprites makes it extremely easy to display real-time data in your presentations. You can connect to Google Sheets, custom URL or Google Analytics. And it's not limited to charts and tables - every building block (including text and images) can display live data.

data.name: Features_Sharing_Description
data.value: With Sprites sharing your visual masterpiece has never been easier. Click an icon and let your friends and followers know what you're up to and check out your work.

data.name: Features_Support_Description
data.value: We are striving to provide every single user with the best possible Sprites experience. Don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or need help - we are always there for you.

data.name: Features_Video_Description
data.value: Your entire presentation can be turned into an HD video. You can additionally specify an audio file which is great for adding background music or narration. You can also choose to let Sprites upload your video on YouTube for you.

data.name: Email_PresentationSharing_Body
data.value:
Hello there!

Someone has shared with you an infographic "{0}". Click "Confirm sharing" below to access it:

Confirm sharing

All the best,
Pavel Volgarev (Sprites).

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_1_A
data.value: Month-to-month billing is when you only pay for one month and you are not automatically charged for the following one. This way it is more convenient for you as it allows you to easily switch between different plans and protects you from potentially unwanted long term commitments.

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_2_A
data.value: Simply go to spritesapp.com/account, choose a different plan and click "Save changes".

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_2_Q
data.value: How do I upgrade to a different plan?

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_3_A
data.value: You don't need to! As we mentioned, all the payments are non-recurring which means that at the end of the billing period (one month) your subscription will expire and you can either renew your month-to-month subscription by submitting another payment or switch to our free plan.

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_3_Q
data.value: How do I cancel my plan?

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_4_A
data.value: Nothing! All the visual content you have previously created under your paid plan will continue to work even after you switch to our free plan. We do not lock or disable anything related to your data or the content you have already published, but you will only be able to edit your existing content under the free plan feature-set.

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_4_Q
data.value: What happens to my work when I cancel my plan?

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_5_A
data.value: Definitely! If you are a student or a non-for-profit organization and wish to test out one of our advanced plans, simply contact us at contact@spritesapp.com and we will figure something out!

data.name: Features_Collaboration_Description
data.value: Sprites offers a unique collaboration functionality that will empower your team and improve your organization's workflow, whether you are big or small. Easy sharing, live collaborative editing and team chat - working together on your infographics has never been easier.

data.name: UpgradePlan
data.value: Want to switch to a new plan? Go to your account

data.name: PleaseChangeYourPassword
data.value: We have reset your password. Please specify a new one now.

data.name: Account_CompanyName_Description
data.value: What's that awesome place you work at?

data.name: Sunset
data.value: Sprites is shutting down on August 1st, 2016. Read the statement
